name: Battle Rabbit (ArthyChaux)
description:
Two players are controlled by one keyboard and a third one can control the mouse.
The two ones need to get the other out before catching the muffin to win ! But be careful not to explode or to get crushed by a stegosaurus or by a piano ordered by the third one.

Controls :
 - ZQSD / Arrows to move
 - E / Right Shift to enter manhole cover
 - Space / Enter to make an explosion
 - Left Click to make a piano fall
 - Escape to restart
